dcterms:description: A dataset containing 2,750 videos from 18 different tasks, with an average of 7.6 actions per video, used for weakly supervised learning from instructional videos.
dcterms:title: CrossTask

dcterms:creator: Jean-Baptiste Alayrac
Piotr Bojanowski
Nishant Agrawal

Ivan Laptev
Simon Lacoste-Julien
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 150 videos about 5 daily tasks, which has 9.5 actions in one video on average, used for unsupervised learning from narrated instruction videos.
dcterms:title: NIV

dcterms:creator: Yansong Tang

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for comprehensive instructional video analysis, containing 11,827 videos across 180 different tasks with an average of 3.6 actions per video.
dcterms:title: COIN
